Module_Description: The distance_sensor module enables you to write code that reacts to specific distances or light up the Distance Sensor in different ways.
SubModule_Description: The distance_sensor module enables you to write code that reacts to specific distances or light up the Distance Sensor in different ways.

Function.Function_Description: Retrieve the distance in millimeters captured by the Distance Sensor connected to port. If the Distance Sensor cannot read a valid distance it will return -1.

Function_Arguments.Argument_Description: A port from the port submodule in the hub module
